# Progress-circle Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Filled

**Variants:**

| Variant Name | Class |
|--------------|-------|
| Default | `app-progress circle progress-circle-default` |
| Success | `app-progress circle progress-circle-success` |
| Info | `app-progress circle progress-circle-info` |
| Warning | `app-progress circle progress-circle-warning` |
| Danger | `app-progress circle progress-circle-danger` |
